TextView.android:text: 16 Pull Ups
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 10kg Dips ---> 10 Dips
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max L-Sit Hold
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10 Pike Push Ups ---> 10 Russian Push Ups
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
8 Chin Ups + 20.20.20. Isometric Hold
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
12x 70kg Squats
x4-5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 20kg Jumping Lunges (E/S) ---> 15x 20kg Lunges (E/S) ---> 30 Jumping Squats
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 30kg One-Legged Calf Raises (E/S) ---> Max One-Legged Calf Raises (E/S)
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
1 min Wall Sit with 20kg ---> 1 min Broad Jumps
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
10x 5kg Pull Ups + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold ---> 12 Straight Bar Dips ---> 12 Dips
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
7 Chin Ups + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold---> 10 Chin Ups (r) ---> 20 Push Ups
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Bar Leg Raises ---> 1 min Plank with 10kg
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 seconds Front Lever Tuck
x5 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10 seconds Back Lever Tuck
x5 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
20x 50kg Squats
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
30x 40kg Squats
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
30x 30kg Squats
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
30 Sit Ups ---> 30 Roman Twists
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Pull Ups ---> 5 Wide Pull Ups ---> 5 Close Grip Pull Ups
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
20.20.20. Isometric Hold (Pull Up Grip) ---> 20.20.20. Isometric Hold (Chin Up Grip)
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 10kg Push Ups ---> 10 Diamond Push Ups
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Russian Push Ups ---> 10 Straight Bar Dips
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Beginner Program Level 5 - Week 2
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
Do not progress to Week 3 until you can achieve one set of 16 pull ups without letting go off the bar.
